enum.name: CatGenRepresentationMode
enum.abstract: Representation mode of a generative view.

enum.name: CatGenViewRasterMode
enum.abstract: Representation mode of a generative raster view.

enum.name: CatRepresentationMode
enum.abstract: Representation mode of a generative view.

enum.name: CatSheetGenViewsPosMode
enum.abstract: Positioning mode values for generative views inside the sheet.

enum.name: CatThreadLinkedTo
enum.abstract: Specifies the kind of link the thread has.

enum.name: RasterLevelOfDetail
enum.abstract: Precision for views generated as raster (DPI).

class.name: DrawingAreaFill
class.abstract: Represents a drawing area fill in a drawing view.

method.name: GetCharacteristics
method.abstract: Gets the number of contours and the number of points (external and internals contours) of a drawing area fill.

method.name: GetPoints
method.abstract: Get points coordinates of external and internal contours of area fill.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates a drawing area fill from its geometry.

method.name: ModifyPoints
method.abstract: Set points coordinates of external and internal contours of area fill.

method.name: SetPattern
method.abstract: Sets a pattern from its name on an area fill.

method.name: AreaFillType
method.abstract: Returns area fill type.

method.name: DisplayAtTrueDepth
method.abstract: Checks if the Area Fill has its "Display at true depth" property valued to True or False.

class.name: DrawingAreaFills
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing area fills currently managed by a drawing view of drawing sheet in a drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates an isolated DrawingAreaFill and adds it to the DrawingAreaFills collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing area fill using its index from the DrawingAreaFills collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a DrawingAreaFill from the DrawingAreaFills collection.

class.name: DrawingComponent
class.abstract: Represents a drawing component instance (ditto) in a drawing view.

method.name: Explode
method.abstract: Explodes the drawing component instance (every sub elements of the drawing component are created).

method.name: ExplodeAndSelect
method.abstract: Explodes the drawing component instance (every sub elements of the drawing component are created) and put created sub elements in selection set.

method.name: ExposeCompRef
method.abstract: Exposes the component reference of this drawing component instance in a new detail sheet.

method.name: ExposeCompRefInSheet
method.abstract: Exposes the component reference of this drawing component instance in a specific detail sheet.

method.name: Flip
method.abstract: Flips the drawing component instance around X axis To flip around Y axis you have to flip the component around X and to add a rotation of 180 degrees.

method.name: GetFlip
method.abstract: Returns the flip state of a drawing component instance around X axis.

method.name: GetMatrix
method.abstract: Gets the matrix of the drawing component instance.

method.name: GetModifiableObject
method.abstract: Gets a modifiable object by index or name in this drawing component instance.

method.name: GetModifiableObjectsCount
method.abstract: Gets the number of modifiable objects in this drawing component instance.

method.name: SetMatrix
method.abstract: Sets the matrix of the drawing component instance.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the angle of the drawing component instance.

method.name: CompRef
method.abstract: Returns the component reference of this drawing component instance.

method.name: Scale2
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the drawing component instance (Workaround for VBA keyword).

method.name: x
method.abstract: Returns or sets the x coordinate of the drawing component instance position.

method.name: y
method.abstract: Returns or sets the y coordinate of the drawing component instance position.

class.name: DrawingComponents
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing components (ditto) currently managed by a drawing view of drawing sheet in a drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a drawing component instance and adds it to the DrawingComponents collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing component instance using its index or its name from the DrawingComponents collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a drawing component from the DrawingComponents collection.

class.name: DrawingDefineGenView
class.abstract: Creates the Generative View.

method.name: DefineAuxiliaryView
method.abstract: Defines an auxiliary drawing view.

method.name: DefineCircularDetailView
method.abstract: Defines a detail or a clipped drawing view.

method.name: DefineFrontView
method.abstract: Defines a drawing front view.

method.name: DefineIsometricView
method.abstract: Defines an isometric drawing view.

method.name: DefinePolygonalDetailView
method.abstract: Defines a detail or a clipped drawing view.

method.name: DefineProjectionView
method.abstract: Defines a projection drawing view.

method.name: DefineSectionView
method.abstract: Defines a section drawing view.

method.name: DefineStandAloneSection
method.abstract: Defines a section view without a reference view.

method.name: DefineUnfoldedView
method.abstract: Defines a unfolded drawing view.

class.name: DrawingGenService
class.abstract: Interface representing the service to retrieve the generative view properties.

method.name: CheckViewLinkIntegrity
method.abstract:
Checks the integrity of elements to be pointed by a generative view
Role: This service tests the integrity of the information contained in the list iInfoOnViewLinks: Checks if the elements will be pointed by the generative view are referenced by the same product structure.

method.name: DrawingGenViewProp
method.abstract: Returns a generative view properties.

class.name: DrawingGenView
class.abstract: Manages the Generative View.

method.name: AddBreakout
method.abstract: Adds a breakout on the current view.

method.name: AddBrokenView
method.abstract: Adds a broken operator to a the generative drawing view.

method.name: AddClippingBox
method.abstract: Adds a clipping box.

method.name: AddClippingWithCircle
method.abstract: Adds a Circular exact clipping on the current view.

method.name: AddClippingWithProfile
method.abstract: Adds a polygonal clipping on the current view.

method.name: AddLink
method.abstract: Adds a link to the generative view.

method.name: ApplyBreakoutTo
method.abstract: If a view have gone through a breakout view operation, this method realize a breakout view on the view given as parameter, and the other types of the view remain.

method.name: ApplyClippingBoxTo
method.abstract:
Applies a clipping box to the generative view given as parameter
Role: If a view have gone through a clipping box view operation, this method realize a clipping view on the view given as parameter, and the other types of the view remain.

method.name: ForceUpdate
method.abstract: Forces the Update of the generative view even if not necessary.

method.name: GetAssociatedRootProduct
method.abstract: Returns the root product associated to the drawing view.

method.name: GetAxisSystem
method.abstract: Retrieves the axis systeme associated with the view.

method.name: GetLink
method.abstract: Returns the link of the generative view.

method.name: GetNumberOfInfoForLink
method.abstract: Returns the number of info associated to a link of the generative view.

method.name: IsClipped
method.abstract: Returns whether the drawing view is a clipping view.

method.name: IsClippedByBox
method.abstract: Returns whether the drawing view contains a 3D clipping Box opaerator.

method.name: ModifyProjectionPlane
method.abstract: Modifies the drawing generative view projection plane.

method.name: PutLinks
method.abstract: Applies links on a generative view.

method.name: RemoveGVS
method.abstract: Removes the GVS associated to the generative view.

method.name: RemoveLink
method.abstract: Removes a link of the generative view.

method.name: SetAxisSystem
method.abstract: Defines an axis systeme in the view.

method.name: UnBreak
method.abstract: Removes the break view operation applied on the generative view.

method.name: UnBreakout
method.abstract: Removes the breakout applied on the generative view.

method.name: UnClip
method.abstract: Removes the clip applied on the generative view.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Updates the generative view.

method.name: GVSName
method.abstract: Returns or sets the generative view style of a generative view.

method.name: GenViewProperties
method.abstract: Returns or sets the generative view properties of a generative view.

method.name: NumberOfBreakouts
method.abstract: Returns the number of breakouts contained in the generative view.

method.name: NumberOfBreaks
method.abstract: Returns the number of breaks contained in the broken generative view.

method.name: NumberOfLinks
method.abstract: Returns the number of view links of the generative view.

method.name: ParentView
method.abstract: Returns the parent view.

class.name: DrawingGenViewProperties
class.abstract: Represents the generative properties of a drawing generative view.

method.name: ApproximateParameter
method.abstract: Returns or sets the level of detail for views generated as approximated view.

method.name: AutoHiddenLineMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Auto hidden line mode.

method.name: AxisLineMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view axisline mode.

method.name: CenterlineMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view centerline mode.

method.name: ColorInheritanceMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view color inheritance mode.

method.name: FilletRepresentation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view fillet representation mode.

method.name: HiddenLineMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view hidden line drawing mode.

method.name: ImagePrintPrecisionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the print precision mode for views generated as pixel image (DPI).

method.name: ImageViewMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the representation mode for views generated as pixel image.

method.name: ImageVisuPrecisionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the visualization precision mode for views generated as pixel image (DPI).

method.name: LimitBoundingBox
method.abstract: Returns or sets the bounding box limits under which a part.

method.name: OcclusionCullingMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view occlusion culling mode.

method.name: PatternGenerationMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view pattern generation.

method.name: PointsProjectionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets projection mode for 3D points.

method.name: PointsSymbol
method.abstract: Returns or sets symbol for projected points.

method.name: PrintPrecision
method.abstract: Returns or sets the print precision for views generated as pixel image (DPI).

method.name: RepresentationMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets generated geometry representation mode.

method.name: Scan3DRepsMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets 3D rep instances projection strategy.

method.name: SmoothEdgesGenerationMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Smooth Edges Generation mode for the View.

method.name: ThreadMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the view thread mode.

method.name: VisuPrecision
method.abstract: Returns or sets the visualization precision for views generated as pixel image (DPI).

method.name: WireframeExtractionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets projection mode for 3D wireframe.

class.name: DrawingPageSetup
class.abstract: Represents the page setup for the drawing representations.

method.name: ChooseBestOrientation
method.abstract: Activates or deactivates the choice of the best orientation.

method.name: FitToPrinterFormat
method.abstract: Fits the format of the print to the printer format.

method.name: FitToSheetFormat
method.abstract: Fits the format of the print to the sheet format.

class.name: DrawingPicture
class.abstract: Represents a drawing picture in a drawing view.

method.name: GetOriginalHeight
method.abstract: Gets the original height of the drawing picture.

method.name: GetOriginalWidth
method.abstract: Gets the original width of the drawing picture.

method.name: DisplayAtTrueDepth
method.abstract: Checks if the picture has its "Display at true depth" property valued to True or False.

method.name: PictureType
method.abstract: Gets the type of a picture.

method.name: cropBottom
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cropBottom of the drawing picture.

method.name: cropLeft
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cropLeft of the drawing picture.

method.name: cropRight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cropRight of the drawing picture.

method.name: cropTop
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cropTop of the drawing picture.

method.name: format
method.abstract: Sets the picture format.

method.name: height
method.abstract: Returns or sets the height of the drawing picture.

method.name: ratioLock
method.abstract: Returns or sets the ratioLock of the drawing picture.

method.name: width
method.abstract: Returns or sets the width of the drawing picture.

method.name: x
method.abstract: Returns or sets the x coordinate of the drawing picture position.

method.name: y
method.abstract: Returns or sets the y coordinate of the drawing picture position.

class.name: DrawingPictures
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing pictures currently managed by a drawing view of drawing sheet in a drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Inserts a drawing picture in the drawing view and adds it to the DrawingPictures collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing picture using its index or its name from the DrawingPictures collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a drawing picture from the DrawingPictures collection.

class.name: DrawingRoot
class.abstract: Represents the drawing object in drawing representation.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates all the drawing views of all the drawing sheets of the drawing representation.

method.name: Load3DData
method.abstract: Loads 3D data pointed by the drawing representation in the session.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Updates all the drawing sheets of the drawing representation.

method.name: reorder_Sheets
method.abstract: Changes the positions of the sheets in this drawing according to the given ordered list.

method.name: ActiveSheet
method.abstract: Retrieves or sets the active sheet of the drawing.

method.name: Parameters
method.abstract: Returns the collection of parameters of the drawing representation.

method.name: Relations
method.abstract: Returns the collection of relations of the drawing representation.

method.name: Sheets
method.abstract: Returns the collection of drawing sheets of the drawing representation.

method.name: Standard
method.abstract: Returns or sets the drawing standard name of the drawing representation.

class.name: DrawingService
class.abstract: Interface representing the service to retrieve available drawing standards and sheet styles.

method.name: NumberOfSheetStyles
method.abstract: Returns the number of sheet style from a given standard.

method.name: SheetStyleNamesList
method.abstract: Returns the list of available Sheet style for a given standard.

method.name: StandardNamesList
method.abstract: Returns the list of available standard names.

method.name: NumberOfStandards
method.abstract: Returns the number of standards in the environment.

class.name: DrawingSheet
class.abstract: Represents a drawing sheet of the drawing representation.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Activates the drawing sheet.

method.name: ForceUpdate
method.abstract: Forces the update of all the drawing views of the drawing sheet.

method.name: GenerateDimensions
method.abstract: Generates dimensions in all the drawing views of the drawing sheet.

method.name: GetPaperHeight
method.abstract: Gets the paper width of the drawing sheet.

method.name: GetPaperWidth
method.abstract: Gets the paper width of the drawing sheet.

method.name: IsDetail
method.abstract: Checks whether the sheet is a detail sheet.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates the drawing sheet.

method.name: PrintOut
method.abstract: Prints the drawing sheet according to its page setup on the default printer.

method.name: PrintToFile
method.abstract: Prints the drawing sheet according its page setup in a file instead of being sent to a printer.

method.name: SetPaperHeight
method.abstract: Sets the paper width of the drawing sheet, avalaible on user format.

method.name: SetPaperWidth
method.abstract: Sets the paper width of the drawing sheet, avalaible on user format.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Updates the drawing views of the drawing sheet.

method.name: reorder_Views
method.abstract: Changes the positions of the views in this sheet according to the given ordered list.

method.name: GenViewsPosMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the generative views position stability mode.

method.name: Orientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the paper orientation.

method.name: PageSetup
method.abstract: Returns the page setup.

method.name: PaperSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the paper size.

method.name: PrintArea
method.abstract: Returns the print area definition object.

method.name: ProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Returns or sets the sheet projection mode .

method.name: Scale
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the drawing sheet.

method.name: Scale2
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the drawing sheet (Workaround for VBA keyword).

method.name: SheetStyle
method.abstract: Sets the sheet Style.

method.name: Views
method.abstract: Returns the drawing view collection of the drawing sheet.

class.name: DrawingSheets
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing sheets currently managed by the drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a drawing sheet and adds it to the DrawingSheets collection.

method.name: AddDetail
method.abstract: Creates a detail drawing sheet and adds it to the DrawingSheets collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing sheet using its index or its name from the DrawingSheets collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a drawing sheet from the DrawingSheets collection.

method.name: ActiveSheet
method.abstract: Returns the active drawing sheet of the drawing representation.

class.name: DrawingThread
class.abstract: Represents a drawing thread in a drawing view.

method.name: IsLinkedTo
method.abstract: Specifies which kind of objects the thread is linked to.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns or sets a CatThreadType (threaded or taped) on a thread.

class.name: DrawingThreads
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing threads currently managed by a drawing view of drawing sheet in a drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a drawing thread and adds it to the DrawingThreads collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing thread using its index from the DrawingThreads collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a drawing thread from the DrawingThreads collection.

class.name: DrawingView
class.abstract: Represents a drawing view in a drawing sheet.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Activates the drawing view.

method.name: AddViewText
method.abstract: Adds a view text in the drawing view.

method.name: AlignedWithReferenceView
method.abstract: Activates the alignment with the reference view.

method.name: GetProjectionPlane
method.abstract: Returns the drawing view projection plane.

method.name: GetViewName
method.abstract: Returns the prefix, the ident and the suffix of the name of the drawing view.

method.name: GetViewText
method.abstract: Returns the the view text of the drawing view.

method.name: InsertViewAngle
method.abstract: Insert the Angle parameter in the text of the drawing text.

method.name: InsertViewScale
method.abstract: Insert the scale parameter in the text of the drawing text.

method.name: IsGenerative
method.abstract: Returns whether the drawing view has a generative behavior.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates the drawing view.

method.name: SaveEdition
method.abstract: Saves the Sketch Edition.

method.name: SetProjectionPlane
method.abstract: Sets the drawing view projection plane.

method.name: SetViewName
method.abstract: Sets the prefix, the ident and the suffix of the name of the drawing view.

method.name: Size
method.abstract: Returns the bounding box of the drawing view.

method.name: UnAlignedWithReferenceView
method.abstract: Deactivates the alignment with the reference view.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the angle of the drawing view.

method.name: AreaFills
method.abstract: Returns the drawing area fill collection of the drawing view.

method.name: Arrows
method.abstract: Returns the drawing arrow collection of the drawing view.

method.name: Components
method.abstract: Returns the drawing component instances collection (i.

method.name: Dimensions
method.abstract: Returns the drawing dimension collection of the drawing view.

method.name: DrawingGenView
method.abstract: Returns the the factory of generated views.

method.name: Factory2D
method.abstract: Returns the 2D factory of the drawing view.

method.name: FrameVisualization
method.abstract: Returns or sets the drawing view frame visualization state.

method.name: GeometricElements
method.abstract: Returns the collection of geometric elements included in the drawing view sketch.

method.name: IsRelationActivated
method.abstract: Returns the status of the alignement with the reference view.

method.name: LockStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lock status of a drawing view.

method.name: Pictures
method.abstract: Returns the drawing picture collection of the drawing view.

method.name: ReferenceView
method.abstract: Returns or sets the reference view.

method.name: Scale
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the drawing view.

method.name: Scale2
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the drawing view (Workaround for VBA keyword).

method.name: Tables
method.abstract: Returns the drawing table collection of the drawing view.

method.name: Texts
method.abstract: Returns the drawing text collection of the drawing view.

method.name: Threads
method.abstract: Returns the drawing thread collection of the drawing view.

method.name: ViewType
method.abstract: Returns the drawing view type.

method.name: Weldings
method.abstract: Returns the drawing welding collection of the drawing view.

method.name: x
method.abstract: For an interactive view, get_x and put_x methods are equivalents to get_xAxisData, put_xAxisData In a generative case, get_x.

method.name: xAxisData
method.abstract: Returns or sets the x coordinate of the drawing view coordinate system origin.

method.name: y
method.abstract: For an interactive view, get_y and put_y methods are equivalents to get_yAxisData, put_yAxisData In a generative case, get_y.

method.name: yAxisData
method.abstract: Returns or sets the y coordinate of the drawing view coordinate system origin.

class.name: DrawingViews
class.abstract: A collection of all the drawing views currently managed by a drawing sheet in a drawing representation.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a drawing view and adds it to the drawing view collection.

method.name: AddFrontView
method.abstract: Creates a Front View and adds it to the drawing view collection.

method.name: AddIsometricView
method.abstract: Creates an Isometric View and adds it to the drawing view collection.

method.name: AddProjectionView
method.abstract: Creates a Projection View and adds it to the drawing view collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a drawing view using its index or its name from the DrawingViews collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a drawing view from the DrawingViews collection.

method.name: ActiveView
method.abstract: Returns the active drawing view of the active drawing sheet.

method.name: DrawingDefineGenView
method.abstract: Returns the the factory of generated views.

class.name: PrintArea
class.abstract: Manages print area of drawing sheet.

method.name: GetArea
method.abstract: Gets the printing area defined on an object.

method.name: SetArea
method.abstract: Sets a set of coordinates to define a rectangle print area.

method.name: ActivationState
method.abstract: Activates or deactivates the print area.

method.name: AreaHeigth
method.abstract: Valuates the heigth of the print area.

method.name: AreaLowX
method.abstract: Valuates the low x coordinate of the print area.

method.name: AreaLowY
method.abstract: Valuates the low y coordinate of the print area.

method.name: AreaWidth
method.abstract: Valuates the width of the print area.
